text:
We have custom visibility for tablet since hs only supports 1 media query :sob:  

So idk if I’d want that until more device support is added

Module.html files can get large fast with dynamic styles from the styles tab.

Current module file structure is
Meta.json
Fields.json
Module.html
Module.css
Module.js

What if we could add an optional `dynamic.css` to the folder structure where everything in it would be 
• automatically scoped to a module instance
• able to use hubl 
• Rendered, minified, and injected on the page
That could eliminate file complexity for large/complex modules
